title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 § 2188.4 - HFA State Credit Ceiling Credits Allowance Process
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 § 2188.4 - HFA State Credit Ceiling Credits Allowance Process

State Regulations

The agency does not currently receive any sub-allocation of
LIHTC from the division and therefore does not expect to allocate any
competitive, 9 percent, credits. In the event that the agency receives a
sub-allocation, HFA will allocate the credits pursuant to the definitions, processes, competitive scoring criteria, procedures and requirements contained
in Part 2040 of Title 9 of the New York Official Compilation of Codes, Rules
and Regulations which is available on the agency's website, https://hcr.ny.gov/, and/or any
additional agency guidance, which may include a pertinent Term

Sheet. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
§
2188.4

Amended

New

York State Register June 11, 2025/Volume XLVII, Issue 23, eff. 6/11/2025

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. The
